case_title: Deputy Commissioner, SRB, Karachi vs M/s. Byco Terminal Pakistan Limited

facts.taxable_services: Contractual Execution of Work or Furnishing Supplies under Tariff Heading 9809.0000
facts.non_compliance: No sales tax deposited or returns filed

appellant.contention: Composite service not necessary for invoking Tariff Heading 9809.0000

respondent.claim: Services not taxable under Tariff Heading 9809.0000
respondent.contention: Services of storage and rental are not taxable under the Act

tariff_heading_9809.0000.components_required: Contractual execution of work and furnishing supplies
tariff_heading_9809.0000.exemption_conditions: Value of services not exceeding Rs.50 million annually

high_court_ruling.case: Younus (Private) Limited vs Government of Sindh
high_court_ruling.finding: Renting of immovable property not taxable under the Act
